zones.suggested_route: Head to the North to kill the boss. The Mysterious Campsite spawns to the left or right of the starting zone.
zones.notes: Beira is always north/northeast of waypoint. Mud Burrow and the worm boss can be skipped.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Beira of the Rotten Pack
points_of_interest.location_hint: Always north/northeast of waypoint

points_of_interest.name: Mysterious Campsite (Abandoned Stash)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Spawns to the left or right of the starting zone

points_of_interest.name: Mud Burrow Entrance / Waypoint
points_of_interest.location_hint: Can be skipped - worm boss is not required

walkthrough_steps.action: Kill Beira of the Rotten Pack
walkthrough_steps.tip: Boss is always north/northeast of waypoint

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to Grelwood
walkthrough_steps.tip: Use checkpoint from Beira to return if you find exit first

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Mysterious Campsite
walkthrough_steps.tip: Uncut support gem reward - spawns left or right of starting zone

zones.suggested_route: This zone is often skipped by speedrunners. Boss is typically found within the area.
zones.notes: Entire zone is optional and can be skipped. Only recommended for first characters.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Devourer
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Skill Gem (Level 2) (Boss Drop), Uncut Support Gem (Level 1) (Quest Reward)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Boss is typically found within the area

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill The Devourer
walkthrough_steps.tip: Entire zone is optional - speedrunners skip this

zones.suggested_route: Follow the diamond pattern to find the four main points of interest. The Red Vale entrance is usually in the same quadrant as the Brambleghast arena.
zones.notes: Find waypoint first (somewhat in center). Enter zones to take their waypoints, then backtrack to Grelwood.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Brambleghast
points_of_interest.location_hint: Usually in same quadrant as Red Vale entrance

points_of_interest.name: Aregane's Hut (Witch Hut)
points_of_interest.reward: Medium Life and Medium Mana Flask, Uncut Support Gem (Level 1)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Look for the Cauldron encounter - free medium life/mana flask

points_of_interest.name: Tree of Souls + Waypoint
points_of_interest.location_hint: Somewhat in center of zone

points_of_interest.name: Grim Tangle Entrance
points_of_interest.location_hint: Enter zone, take waypoint, then backtrack to Grelwood

points_of_interest.name: The Red Vale Entrance
points_of_interest.location_hint: Enter zone, take waypoint, then backtrack to Grelwood

walkthrough_steps.action: Find waypoint and talk to quest NPC
walkthrough_steps.tip: Waypoint is somewhat in center of zone

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to Grim Tangle
walkthrough_steps.tip: Enter zone, take waypoint, backtrack to Grelwood

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to Red Vale
walkthrough_steps.tip: Enter zone, take waypoint, backtrack to Grelwood

walkthrough_steps.action: Go to Red Vale
walkthrough_steps.tip: Either via waypoint or checkpoint

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Brambleghast
walkthrough_steps.tip: Level 2 uncut skill gem reward

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Cauldron in the Witch Hut encounter
walkthrough_steps.tip: Free medium mana/life flask

town_visits.instructions: Go back to town, get runic tools from Renly
Go to Grelwood waypoint, click the three runes, talk to Una
Go back to town, talk to Una

zones.suggested_route: Follow a general loop pattern to locate the three Rust Altars for the quest.
zones.notes: Find the three obelisks and get the three quest items (Rust Altars).

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Rust King
points_of_interest.location_hint: Found after completing the Rust Altars quest

points_of_interest.name: Weapon Piles (Multiple)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Located throughout the zone

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the three obelisks and get the three quest items
walkthrough_steps.tip: Follow a loop pattern to locate all three Rust Altars

walkthrough_steps.action: Return to Grelwood for town visit sequence
walkthrough_steps.tip: See town visits for detailed steps

zones.suggested_route: Head in the opposite direction of the entrance; this is where the area 'opens up' and usually leads to the exit.
zones.notes: The Rotten Druid boss is optional. Head to Cemetery of the Eternals after entering.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Rotten Druid (Optional)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Found in the area where it 'opens up' opposite the entrance

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to Cemetery of the Eternals
walkthrough_steps.tip: Head opposite direction of entrance where area opens up

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill The Rotten Druid
walkthrough_steps.tip: Uncut support gem reward

zones.suggested_route: Hug one wall; one tomb (Mausoleum or Tomb of the Consort) often spawns alongside the same wall as the Boss arena (57%+ of the time).
zones.notes: Clear both tombs before fighting Lachlann. Use checkpoint to teleport to zone beginning, then waypoint back to Cemetery.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Lachlann of Endless Lament
points_of_interest.location_hint: Hug one wall - boss arena often on same wall as one tomb entrance

points_of_interest.name: Ancient Ruin Sarcophagus (beside Grieving Epitaph)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Found beside Grieving Epitaph

points_of_interest.name: Mausoleum of the Praetor Entrance
points_of_interest.location_hint: One tomb entrance - complete Sorrow Among Stones quest

points_of_interest.name: Tomb of the Consort Entrance
points_of_interest.location_hint: Second tomb entrance - complete Sorrow Among Stones quest

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Mausoleum, kill the boss inside
walkthrough_steps.tip: On second boss, use checkpoint to teleport to zone beginning, then waypoint to Cemetery

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Tomb, kill the boss inside
walkthrough_steps.tip: Part of Sorrow Among Stones quest

walkthrough_steps.action: Talk to Lachlann, open the gate, kill Lachlann
walkthrough_steps.tip: Main boss after completing both tombs

walkthrough_steps.action: Enter Hunting Grounds
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue to next zone

quests.name: Sorrow Among Stones
quests.description: Requires killing bosses in Mausoleum of the Praetor and Tomb of the Consort.

zones.suggested_route: The Boss arena tends to spawn in the opposite quadrant of your entrance tile. Search for the distinctive ribbed outer edge of the boss tile.
zones.notes: Part of Sorrow Among Stones quest. Kill Draven to progress.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Draven
points_of_interest.reward: Part of Sorrow Among Stones quest
points_of_interest.location_hint: Boss arena spawns in opposite quadrant from entrance - look for ribbed outer edge

points_of_interest.name: Forgotten Riches (Treasure Trove)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure encounter

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Boss: Draven
walkthrough_steps.tip: Required for Sorrow Among Stones quest

zones.suggested_route: The boss area is typically found along the top of the area.
zones.notes: Part of Sorrow Among Stones quest. Optional: Find Embattled Trove for uncut support gem.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Asinia
points_of_interest.reward: Part of Sorrow Among Stones quest
points_of_interest.location_hint: Boss area typically found along the top of the area

points_of_interest.name: Haunted Treasure (Embattled Trove)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Ambush encounter within the tomb

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Boss: Asinia
walkthrough_steps.tip: Required for Sorrow Among Stones quest

walkthrough_steps.action: In the Tomb, find the Embattled Trove ambush encounter
walkthrough_steps.tip: Uncut support gem reward

zones.suggested_route: Follow the edges and avoid the middle. Points of Interest are located in or close to the corners.
zones.notes: Kill Crowbell first (required for Book of Specialisation). Find exits to Ogham Farmlands and Freythorn, take their waypoints, then backtrack.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Crowbell
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Found in or close to corners - follow edges

points_of_interest.name: Ritual Encounter (Large Ritual Altar)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Large ritual altar in corners

points_of_interest.name: Dryadic Ritual (Tree Creatures)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Dryad encounter in corners

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Crowbell
walkthrough_steps.tip: 2 skill points reward - follow edges, POIs in corners

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to Ogham Farmlands
walkthrough_steps.tip: Enter zone, take waypoint, backtrack to Hunting Grounds

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to Freythorn
walkthrough_steps.tip: Enter zone, take waypoint, backtrack to Hunting Grounds

walkthrough_steps.action: Go to Freythorn
walkthrough_steps.tip: Via townportal+waypoint if it isn't the last you found

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and complete the Ritual site
walkthrough_steps.tip: Level 4 uncut skill gem

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and finish the Dryad Encounter
walkthrough_steps.tip: Uncut support gem

zones.suggested_route: Make a loop to find all three Ritual encounters. If you find the boss arena early, watch for 'black magic swirls' which point to any incomplete Rituals.
zones.notes: Do all 4 rituals, kill King in the Mists at the 4th ritual. Then go to Ogham Farmlands.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The King in the Mists (after 4 rituals)
points_of_interest.reward: Permanent Buff: +30 to Maximum Spirit, Uncut Spirit Gem (Level 4)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Complete all 4 rituals to spawn boss - watch for black magic swirls pointing to incomplete rituals

walkthrough_steps.action: Do all 4 rituals, kill King in the Mists at the 4th
walkthrough_steps.tip: +30 spirit (normal difficulty only) - make a loop to find all rituals

walkthrough_steps.action: Go to Ogham Farmlands
walkthrough_steps.tip: Via townportal+waypoint

zones.suggested_route: Exit is always on the opposite wall of the entrance. Find Una's Hut behind a hut/cart combo.
zones.notes: Find Una's lute (somewhat in center) for 2 skill points. Then find exit to Ogham Village.

points_of_interest.name: Una's Lute (inside Una's Lute Box)
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Somewhat in center of zone - behind a hut/cart combo

points_of_interest.name: Crop Circle (Ambush)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Kill the rare dog in the crop circle

walkthrough_steps.action: Find Una's lute
walkthrough_steps.tip: Somewhat in center of zone - 2 skill points reward

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to Ogham Village
walkthrough_steps.tip: Exit always on opposite wall of entrance

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Crop Circle and kill the rare dog
walkthrough_steps.tip: Level 4 uncut skill gem

zones.suggested_route: Hug the right-hand wall from the entrance and head up (North) toward the boss arena.
zones.notes: Find Smithing tools (only needed on first character per league). Kill Executioner, then go to Manor Ramparts.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Executioner
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Support Gem (Level 1), Uncut Skill Gem (Level 5) (Quest Reward: Save Leitis)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Hug right-hand wall from entrance, head north to boss arena

points_of_interest.name: Renly's Workshop (Smithing Tools)
points_of_interest.reward: Unlocks Salvage Bench, Artificer's Orb, Blank Lesser Rune
points_of_interest.location_hint: First character per league only - unlocks salvaging bench

walkthrough_steps.action: Find Smithing tools
walkthrough_steps.tip: Only needed on first character per league - unlocks salvaging bench

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill the Executioner
walkthrough_steps.tip: Save Leitis quest - hug right wall, head north

walkthrough_steps.action: Go to Manor Ramparts
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue to next zone

town_visits.instructions: Talk to Renly to turn in the smithing tools (first character per league only)

zones.suggested_route: Follow the U-shaped pattern.
zones.notes: Find exit to Ogham Manor. Always go opposite direction of waypoint after entering zone. The Gallows is the location from character creation screen.

points_of_interest.name: The Gallows (Hanged Man)
points_of_interest.location_hint: The location from the character creation screen

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to Ogham Manor
walkthrough_steps.tip: Follow U-shaped pattern - always go opposite direction of waypoint after entering zone

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Gallows
walkthrough_steps.tip: The location from character creation screen - uncut support gem

zones.suggested_route: Head Northeast, cross the bridge, proceed North to the boss, then Southeast for the Level 2 entrance.
zones.notes: Find and kill Candlemass. If you find stairs first, go down, take checkpoint, then go back up. You can checkpoint from Candlemass to stairs once you found and killed it.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Candlemass, the Living Rite
points_of_interest.location_hint: Head Northeast, cross bridge, proceed North

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Candlemass
walkthrough_steps.tip: If you find stairs first, go down, take checkpoint, then go back up

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and go down stairs twice
walkthrough_steps.tip: You can checkpoint from Candlemass to stairs once killed

zones.suggested_route: Head in the opposite direction of the entrance, cross the bridge, and continue toward the third floor entrance (Northeast if starting from Southwest).
zones.notes: Pass through to third floor. No bosses or POIs on this floor.

walkthrough_steps.action: Head to third floor entrance
walkthrough_steps.tip: Opposite direction of entrance, cross bridge, head Northeast if starting Southwest

zones.suggested_route: Head in the opposite direction from the entrance to find the bridge leading to the boss elevator.
zones.notes: Final boss of Act 1. Find elevator to boss, kill boss, then go back to town.

points_of_interest.name: Final Boss: Count of Ogham
points_of_interest.location_hint: Head opposite direction from entrance to find bridge leading to boss elevator

walkthrough_steps.action: Find elevator to boss, kill boss, go back to town
walkthrough_steps.tip: Completes Act 1 - head opposite direction from entrance

town_visits.instructions: Talk to the Hooded One to go to Act 2

zones.suggested_route: Follow the inside wall corresponding to the direction the town area 'leans' (Z-shape pattern) until you find a narrow canyon leading to the boss.
zones.notes: Find and kill Rathbreaker, then portal back to camp and enter caravan. Speak to everyone and use desert map to go to Mawdun Quarry.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Rathbreaker
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Skill Gem (Level 6) (Quest Reward), Progresses Earning Passage quest
points_of_interest.location_hint: Follow inside wall (Z-shape pattern) to narrow canyon leading to boss

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Rathbreaker
walkthrough_steps.tip: Follow Z-shape pattern along inside wall to find narrow canyon

walkthrough_steps.action: Portal back to camp, enter caravan
walkthrough_steps.tip: Can also go ESC - respawn at checkpoint

town_visits.instructions: Speak to everyone, use desert map to go to Mawdun Quarry

zones.suggested_route: Follow an S-shape or Z-shape pattern, hugging a wall and following the bridges to the Mawdun Mine entrance.
zones.notes: Find exit to Mawdun Mine. Follow the checkpoints across bridges.

points_of_interest.name: Faridun War Cache
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure cache in the quarry

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to Mawdun Mine
walkthrough_steps.tip: Follow S-shape or Z-shape pattern, hug wall and follow bridges

zones.suggested_route: The layout is static (diamond shape); spawn at the bottom, move continuously North to find the boss at the top corner.
zones.notes: Static diamond-shaped layout. Kill Rudja, talk to Risu, portal back to town.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Rudja, the Dread Engineer
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Skill Gem, main storyline progression
points_of_interest.location_hint: Spawn at bottom, move continuously North - boss at top corner

points_of_interest.name: Munitions Bunker
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional area within the mine

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Rudja
walkthrough_steps.tip: Diamond-shaped layout - move North from spawn to find boss at top

walkthrough_steps.action: Talk to Risu, portal back to town
walkthrough_steps.tip: Main storyline progression

town_visits.instructions: Talk to Risu, then use desert map to go to Halani Gates
Talk to Asala at the gates, go back to caravan, talk to Risu again, then to Asala again
Use desert map to go to Traitor's Passage

zones.suggested_route: Find the Decree of Imprisonment. Follow the yellow paper seals on the walls to locate Balbala. The opposite direction leads to The Halani Gates.
zones.notes: Follow yellow paper seals on walls to find Balbala. Stairs up leads to Halani Gates. Bell Chest is in a dead end with checkpoint.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Balbala, the Traitor
points_of_interest.reward: Djinn Barya (access to Trial of the Sekhema for Ascendancy)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Follow yellow paper seals on walls - if you find paper, you are close

points_of_interest.name: Bell Chest
points_of_interest.location_hint: In a dead end with checkpoint, some monsters and dropped gold on ground

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Balbala, pick up the Djinn Barya quest item
walkthrough_steps.tip: Follow yellow paper seals - unlocks Trial of the Sekhema for Ascendancy

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Halani Gates
walkthrough_steps.tip: Stairs up means you are on the right way

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and loot the Bell Chest
walkthrough_steps.tip: Two level 6 uncut skill gems (UNCONFIRMED)

zones.suggested_route: Follow the extremely set, narrow layout, moving in the opposite direction from the entrance and crossing the bridges.
zones.notes: Kill Jamanra. Go down stairs and to bottom right of zone, then back to town. Take waypoint to Trial of Sekhemas later.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Jamanra, the Risen King
points_of_interest.reward: Advances The Trail of Corruption quest
points_of_interest.location_hint: Keep close to canyon - cross canyon three times to find boss

points_of_interest.name: L'Im, the Impaler (Optional)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional boss encounter

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Jamanra the Risen King
walkthrough_steps.tip: Keep close to canyon - cross canyon three times

walkthrough_steps.action: Go down the stairs and to the bottom right of the zone, then back to town
walkthrough_steps.tip: Narrow linear layout - move opposite direction from entrance

town_visits.instructions: Speak to Zarka and turn in her quest (level 7 uncut skill gems)
Use the desert map to go to the Trial of Sekhemas. Take waypoint, then go back to town. Do first ascendancy trial whenever ready.
Talk to everyone, then use desert map to go to Keth

zones.suggested_route: Run the outside edges to find The Venom Pit (for Kabala) and the exit to The Lost City (often in the opposite corner of the central 'square').
zones.notes: Kill Kabala (somewhat in middle) for 2 skill points. Kill monsters until you find Kabala Clan relic (can drop in Lost City too). Exit always bottom right after big bridge.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Kabala, Constrictor Queen
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Somewhat in the middle of zone - run outside edges to find Venom Pit

points_of_interest.name: Abandoned Prayer
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure

walkthrough_steps.action: Kill Kabala, the Constrictor Queen
walkthrough_steps.tip: Somewhat in middle - 2 skill points reward

walkthrough_steps.action: Kill snake monsters until you find the Kabala Clan relic
walkthrough_steps.tip: Can also drop in the Lost City

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to the Lost City
walkthrough_steps.tip: Always bottom right after big bridge - take checkpoint, do the rest if not done

walkthrough_steps.action: Go to the Lost City
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue to next zone

zones.suggested_route: Cross the V-shaped bridge connecting the two large rectangular sections. Continue in the opposite direction from the entrance to locate the exit to Buried Shrines (often in a corner of the second rectangle).
zones.notes: Find exit to Buried Shrines. Two large rectangles connected by V-shaped bridge - exit often in corner of second rectangle.

points_of_interest.name: Golden Tomb
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure in the city

points_of_interest.name: The Ninth Treasure of Keth (Optional Boss)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Event named 'The Galleria' on the map - big gilded beetle

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit and go to the Buried Shrines
walkthrough_steps.tip: Cross V-shaped bridge, continue opposite direction from entrance

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Golden Tomb
walkthrough_steps.tip: Uncut spirit gem

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Ninth Treasure of Keth (big gilded beetle)
walkthrough_steps.tip: Event name 'The Galleria' on map - Random Jewel

zones.suggested_route: Think of it as two rectangles separated by a pair of bridges. The boss tile (crown shape) is usually at the most Northerly or East-facing point.
zones.notes: Find the Heart of Keth. Boss tile (crown shape) usually at most Northerly or East-facing point. Optional: guarded sarcophagus and elemental offering.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Azarian, the Forsaken Son
points_of_interest.location_hint: Crown-shaped boss tile at most Northerly or East-facing point

points_of_interest.name: Elemental Offering
points_of_interest.location_hint: Random resistance ring - Ruby suggested for upcoming boss fight

points_of_interest.name: Suspicious Sarcophagus
points_of_interest.location_hint: Guarded sarcophagus encounter

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Heart of Keth
walkthrough_steps.tip: Two rectangles separated by bridges - boss at North or East point

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and loot the guarded sarcophagus
walkthrough_steps.tip: Uncut support gem

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and complete the Elemental Offering Event
walkthrough_steps.tip: Random resistance ring - Ruby suggested for upcoming boss fight

town_visits.instructions: Enter Heart of Keth instance, kill Azarian, talk to the goddess, loot the cinders, burn the goddess, loot the essence of water
Talk to Zarka in town (uncut support gem)
Use desert map to go to Mastodon Badlands

zones.suggested_route: Hug a wall until you find the exit to The Bone Pits.
zones.notes: Find exit to Bone Pits. Find Lightless passage to unlock Well of Souls. Optional: kill hyenas until you find Sun Clan relic (more likely in Bone Pits).

points_of_interest.name: Fossilised Memorial
points_of_interest.location_hint: Rare effigy near a checkpoint - Shrine of Bones

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Bone Pits
walkthrough_steps.tip: Hug a wall until you find exit

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Lightless passage to unlock the Well of Souls
walkthrough_steps.tip: Required for progression

walkthrough_steps.action: Kill hyena enemies until you found the Sun Clan relic
walkthrough_steps.tip: Don't stress it - more likely to be found in the Bone Pits

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and loot the Shrine of Bones
walkthrough_steps.tip: Rare effigy near checkpoint - Uncut support Gem

zones.suggested_route: The boss room is almost directly in line with the entrance area after passing through the bone arch.
zones.notes: Kill zone boss and loot horn. Kill hyenas until you find Sun Clan relic. Then portal back to town.

points_of_interest.name: Bosses: Iktab, the Deathlord and Ekbab, Ancient Steed
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Support Gem (Level 1) (Quest Reward for 'A Theft of Ivory')
points_of_interest.location_hint: Boss room almost directly in line with entrance after passing through bone arch

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill the zone boss and loot the horn
walkthrough_steps.tip: Directly in line with entrance after bone arch

walkthrough_steps.action: Kill hyena enemies until you found the Sun Clan relic
walkthrough_steps.tip: Required quest item

walkthrough_steps.action: Portal back to town
walkthrough_steps.tip: Complete quest turn-ins

town_visits.instructions: Talk to Zarka (uncut support gem)
Use desert map to go to the Valley of Titans

zones.suggested_route: Run the outside edge to find the three Ancient Seals required to open the sealed Titan Grotto Entrance (Red Hand icon).
zones.notes: Find and click three ancient seals. Find medallion and place two relics in it (waypoint here). Choose buff (can be changed later).

points_of_interest.name: Offering to Amrit Quest (Medallion)
points_of_interest.reward: Permanent Buff: +30% increased Charm Charges Gained or 15% increased Mana Recovery from Flasks
points_of_interest.location_hint: Waypoint at medallion location - choice of one of two permanent buffs (can be changed later)

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and click the three ancient seals
walkthrough_steps.tip: Run outside edge to find seals - opens Titan Grotto entrance

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the medallion and place the two relics in it
walkthrough_steps.tip: Waypoint is here - choose a buff (can be changed later at any time)

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Titan Grotto
walkthrough_steps.tip: Red Hand icon when sealed

walkthrough_steps.action: Go to the Titan Grotto
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue to boss

zones.suggested_route: Travel from the starting area to the opposite side of the 'rectangle' to find the long staircase bridge leading to the boss, Zalmarath.
zones.notes: Kill boss, then go back to town. Quest reward: uncut support gem and 500 gold.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Zalmarath, the Colossus
points_of_interest.location_hint: Opposite side of rectangle - long staircase bridge leads to boss

points_of_interest.name: Titan's Sword
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure in grotto

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill the boss, then go back to town
walkthrough_steps.tip: Opposite side of rectangle - long staircase bridge

town_visits.instructions: Talk to Zarka, then Asala (uncut support gem)
Use the desert map to travel to the Halani Gates
Go to the front of the caravan and sound the horn
Use the desert map to travel to Deshar

zones.suggested_route: Check the base of the large buildings for the body of the fallen Dekhara Warrior (Final Letter). Continue travelling opposite the entrance to the furthest edge of the second area for the Path of Mourning exit.
zones.notes: Talk to abandoned rhoa. Find final letter on corpse near big tower (2 skill points on turn in). Find exit to Path of Mourning (enter, take waypoint, backtrack).

points_of_interest.name: Tradition's Toll Quest (Final Letter)
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Base of large buildings - corpse on ground near big tower

points_of_interest.name: The Unremembered (Skeleton)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure

points_of_interest.name: Rare Vulture Monsters
points_of_interest.location_hint: Rare mob drops

walkthrough_steps.action: Talk to the abandoned rhoa BECAUSE IT'S THE RIGHT THING TO DO YOU MONSTER
walkthrough_steps.tip: Important moral decision

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the final letter on a corpse on the ground
walkthrough_steps.tip: Near a big tower - 2 skill points on quest turn in

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Path of Mourning
walkthrough_steps.tip: Enter zone, take waypoint, backtrack to Deshar

walkthrough_steps.action: Go the the Path of Mourning
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue to next zone

zones.suggested_route: Travel to the opposite side of the area (potential '3-3-3 Pattern').
zones.notes: Find exit to Spires of Deshar. Travel to opposite side of area.

points_of_interest.name: Hushed Urn
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure along the path

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Spires of Deshar
walkthrough_steps.tip: Travel to opposite side of area - potential 3-3-3 pattern

zones.suggested_route: Tor Gul spawns in a straight line, directly opposite the entrance of the area.
zones.notes: Find Sisters of Garukhan for +10% lightning res. Kill Tor Gul (directly opposite entrance). Portal back to town.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Tor Gul, the Defiler
points_of_interest.location_hint: Spawns in straight line, directly opposite entrance

points_of_interest.name: Sisters of Garukhan
points_of_interest.location_hint: Found in the spires

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Sisters of Garukhan
walkthrough_steps.tip: +10% lightning resistance

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Tor Gul, the Defiler
walkthrough_steps.tip: Directly opposite entrance in straight line

walkthrough_steps.action: Portal back to town
walkthrough_steps.tip: Turn in quests

town_visits.instructions: Turn in the final letter at Shambrin (second 2 skill points)
Talk to everyone, then use desert map to go to the Dreadnought

zones.suggested_route: Straightforward, linear layout. Continue in the opposite direction of the entrance until the final boss arena.
zones.notes: Linear layout. Find exit to Dreadnought Vanguard, then find and kill Jamanra. Portal back to town, talk to Hooded One, go to Act 3.

points_of_interest.name: Final Boss: Jamanra, the Abomination
points_of_interest.reward: Completes The Trail of Corruption, End of Act 2
points_of_interest.location_hint: Linear layout - continue opposite direction from entrance to final boss arena

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Dreadnought Vanguard, then find and kill Jamanra, the Abomination
walkthrough_steps.tip: Linear layout - completes Act 2

walkthrough_steps.action: Portal back to town
walkthrough_steps.tip: End of Act 2

town_visits.instructions: Leave the Caravan, talk to the Hooded One, go back to the Caravan, talk to Asala to go to Act 3

zones.suggested_route: Exit (Ziggurat Encampment) is found on the opposite far wall from the entrance. Run along that wall until found. Azak Campfire is nearby, check both sides.
zones.notes: Exit to Ziggurat Encampment on opposite far wall. Azak Campfire nearby - check both sides. Optional: Rootdredge and Hanging Tree.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Rootdredge (Foul Ritual)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Foul Ritual encounter - optional boss

points_of_interest.name: Azak Campfire (Orok Campsite)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Near exit - kill the two rares - 'Azak Campfire'

points_of_interest.name: Hanging Tree (Click corpse)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Click corpse on hanging tree

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Ziggurat Encampment (town)
walkthrough_steps.tip: Opposite far wall from entrance - run along that wall

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Rootdredge
walkthrough_steps.tip: Level 9 uncut skill gem

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Orok campsite and loot the rare basket
walkthrough_steps.tip: 'Azak Campfire' - kill the two rares - lesser jeweller's orb

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Hanging Tree and loot the magic corpse
walkthrough_steps.tip: Random magic ring

town_visits.instructions: Talk to everyone and exit into the Jungle Ruins

zones.suggested_route: Follow one of the outside walls towards the opposite end (Infested Barrens entrance). Mighty Silverfist usually spawns in the top third of the area.
zones.notes: Find exit to Venom Crypts (near waypoint) - take checkpoint and waypoint, do NOT go through. Kill Mighty Silverfist for 2 skill points. Find exit to Infested Barrens - take checkpoint only.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Mighty Silverfist
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Usually spawns in top third of area

points_of_interest.name: The Venom Crypts Entrance / Waypoint
points_of_interest.location_hint: Near waypoint - take checkpoint and waypoint, do NOT go through yet

points_of_interest.name: Jungle Grave (Servi quest)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Servi quest item

points_of_interest.name: Troubled Camp
points_of_interest.location_hint: Secret vendor - Armour

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to Venom Crypts (near waypoint)
walkthrough_steps.tip: Do NOT go through, only take the checkpoint and waypoint

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill the Mighty Silverfist
walkthrough_steps.tip: 2 skill points - usually in top third of area

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Infested Barrens
walkthrough_steps.tip: Do NOT go through, only take the checkpoint

walkthrough_steps.action: Go to the Infested Barrens
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue zone progression

zones.suggested_route: Find the Corpse-snake Venom in The Den of the Serpent Priestess.
zones.notes: Find corpse for venom phial, then go back to town. Turn in phial at Servi for permanent buff reward (choice cannot be changed later).

points_of_interest.name: Corpse Snake Venom Quest Reward
points_of_interest.reward: Permanent Buff (Choice of +25% Stun Threshold, +30% Elemental Ailment Threshold, or +25% Mana Regeneration Rate); Artificer's Orb
points_of_interest.location_hint: Den of the Serpent Priestess - reward is permanent and cannot be changed later

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the corpse for the venom phial, then go back to town
walkthrough_steps.tip: Located in Den of the Serpent Priestess

town_visits.instructions: Turn in phial at Servi for a reward - reward is permanent and cannot be changed later
Go to the Azak Bog

zones.suggested_route: Run the outside edge of the area to locate exits to Chimeral Wetlands, Azak Bog, and Matlan Waterways.
zones.notes: Find exits to Chimeral Wetlands, Azak Bog, and Matlan Waterways. Enter each zone, take waypoint, backtrack to Barrens. Then portal back to Jungle Ruins.

points_of_interest.name: Troubled Camp
points_of_interest.reward: Sebastian Carroway (Secret Vendor: Weapons), guaranteed Rare Boots
points_of_interest.location_hint: Secret vendor - Weapons, guaranteed Rare Boots

points_of_interest.name: Larva Hollow (The Brood Queen)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional boss encounter

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to Chimeral Wetlands
walkthrough_steps.tip: Enter zone, take waypoint, backtrack to Infested Barrens

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to Azak Bog
walkthrough_steps.tip: Enter zone, take waypoint, backtrack to Infested Barrens

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Matlan Waterways
walkthrough_steps.tip: Waypoint of Barrens itself is here

walkthrough_steps.action: From whatever you find last, take the waypoint and portal back to Jungle Ruins
walkthrough_steps.tip: Return to complete Venom Crypts

zones.suggested_route: The boss, Ignagduk, spawns in the top right quadrant of this area (imagined as a square split into four blocks).
zones.notes: Optional: Flameskin ritual (25% fire res and rarity for rest of zone). Find and kill Ignagduk (+30 spirit). Then go to Chimeral Wetlands.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Ignagduk, the Bog Witch
points_of_interest.location_hint: Top right quadrant - area imagined as square split into four blocks

points_of_interest.name: Flameskin Ritual (Optional)
points_of_interest.reward: Temporary buff to Fire Resistance and Item Rarity
points_of_interest.location_hint: If you find it before boss, don't skip. Don't search for it if you don't find it before boss.

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Flameskin ritual and activate all
walkthrough_steps.tip: 25% fire res and rarity for rest of zone - don't search if not found before boss

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Ignagduk
walkthrough_steps.tip: +30 spirit - top right quadrant

walkthrough_steps.action: Go back to town and then to Chimeral Wetlands
walkthrough_steps.tip: Via waypoint

zones.suggested_route: Hug the outside wall. Xyclucean's arena/Machinarium entrance always faces left/West; Temple of Chaos is always North-facing.
zones.notes: Find temple/trial of chaos (enter, take waypoint, backtrack - do trial later). Kill Chimera boss (follow lefthand border). Enter Jiquani's Machinarium.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Xyclucian, The Chimera
points_of_interest.reward: Chimeral Inscribed Ultimatum (access to Trial of Chaos), Uncut Skill Gem (Level 9)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Follow lefthand border of zone - arena/Machinarium entrance faces left/West

points_of_interest.name: Toxic Bloom (Noxious Behemoth)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional encounter

points_of_interest.name: Ravaged Camp
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the temple/trial of chaos
walkthrough_steps.tip: Enter zone, take waypoint, waypoint back to Wetlands - do trial at any point from now on

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill the Chimera boss
walkthrough_steps.tip: Follow lefthand border of zone - unlocks Trial of Chaos

walkthrough_steps.action: Enter Jiquani's Machinarium
walkthrough_steps.tip: Behind the Chimera boss

zones.suggested_route: Find Small Soul Cores (listen for the jingle) to proceed. The exit to Sanctum is usually in a straight line from the start of the second section. Blackjaw spawns on the far left or right.
zones.notes: Find 3 small soul cores (only 2 needed - 3rd door has gold and chest). Kill Blackjaw (+10% fire res). Exit to Sanctum. Checkpoint port to exit.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Blackjaw, the Remnant
points_of_interest.location_hint: Spawns on far left or right

points_of_interest.name: Unmarked Treasure Vaults (Requires Soul Core)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Third door - optional treasure

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the first small soul core, then open the door
walkthrough_steps.tip: Either left or right of Alva - listen for jingle

walkthrough_steps.action: Find two more small soul cores
walkthrough_steps.tip: 3 total, only 2 needed - 3rd door only some gold and chest

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit towards Jiquani's Sanctum
walkthrough_steps.tip: Usually straight line from start of second section

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Blackjaw
walkthrough_steps.tip: +10% fire res

walkthrough_steps.action: Checkpoint port to the exit, then go to Jiquani's Sanctum
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue progression

zones.suggested_route: Locate a Generator toward the back end of each of the two mirrored sections. Use Medium Soul Cores to power both.
zones.notes: Activate waypoint right after entry. Talk to Alva. Find 2 medium soul cores (random). Activate both generators (left and right back relative to Alva). Wait for soul core to arrive at Alva. Kill Zicoatl, loot large soul core. Go to Infested Barrens waypoint.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Zicoatl, Warden of the Core
points_of_interest.location_hint: Must wait for second soul core to arrive at Alva (red lines on ground)

points_of_interest.name: Paquate's Mechanism (Corruption Altar)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional corruption altar

points_of_interest.name: Grand Soul Core Nexus
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure

walkthrough_steps.action: Activate the waypoint right after the entry
walkthrough_steps.tip: Important for backtracking

walkthrough_steps.action: Talk to Alva
walkthrough_steps.tip: Quest progression

walkthrough_steps.action: Find two medium soul cores
walkthrough_steps.tip: Soul cores completely random in zone

walkthrough_steps.action: Activate both generators
walkthrough_steps.tip: Always to left and right back relative to where Alva is standing

walkthrough_steps.action: Checkpoint back to Alva
walkthrough_steps.tip: Still need to wait until second soul core arrived at Alva (red lines on ground)

walkthrough_steps.action: Kill Zicoatl, Warden of the Core and loot the large soul core
walkthrough_steps.tip: Required for progression

walkthrough_steps.action: Go back to the Infested Barrens waypoint
walkthrough_steps.tip: Insert large soul core there

zones.suggested_route: Linear area; must pull correct levers to lower water and proceed.
zones.notes: Insert large soul core and go to Matlan Waterways. Activate every lever to navigate through zone, then activate big one at end. Port back to town.

points_of_interest.name: Narag's Hut
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure

walkthrough_steps.action: Activate every single lever to navigate through the zone, then activate the big one at the end
walkthrough_steps.tip: Linear area - must pull correct levers to lower water

walkthrough_steps.action: Port back to town
walkthrough_steps.tip: Quest progression

town_visits.instructions: Go down the stairs near the well / the Hooded One
Talk to Alva, enter the Drowned City

zones.suggested_route: Two large blocks connected by an ambush area. Apex of Filth entrance (right/left) or Molten Vault (corner/side). Layout is the same as Utzaal (Past).
zones.notes: Find exit to Molten Vault (NW) - enter, take waypoint, backtrack (first character only). Find exit to Apex of Filth (NE) - enter, take waypoint, backtrack (first character only). Then enter Apex of Filth or Molten Vault.

points_of_interest.name: Crawler Ambush
points_of_interest.location_hint: Ambush encounter between two blocks

points_of_interest.name: Foul Quarters (Multiple)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure rooms

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Molten Vault
walkthrough_steps.tip: Almost always to NW - enter zone, take waypoint, backtrack (first character only)

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Apex of Filth
walkthrough_steps.tip: Almost always to NE - enter zone, take waypoint, backtrack (first character only)

walkthrough_steps.action: Enter the Molten Vault
walkthrough_steps.tip: First character only - unlocks reforging bench

walkthrough_steps.action: Enter the Apex of Filth
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue progression

zones.suggested_route: Linear; kills boss quickly (under 4 minutes) before molten gold floods the area.
zones.notes: Linear. Kill boss quickly (under 4 minutes) before molten gold floods. Talk to Oswald back in town (first character only - unlocks reforging bench). Then enter Apex of Filth.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Mektul, the Forgemaster
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Skill Gem (Level 10), Unlocks Reforging Bench, Artificer's Orb (Quest Reward)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Linear - kill quickly under 4 minutes before molten gold floods

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill the boss, then talk to Oswald back in town
walkthrough_steps.tip: First character only - unlocks reforging bench

walkthrough_steps.action: Enter the Apex of Filth
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue to next zone

quests.name: The Treasures of Utzaal
quests.description: Requires defeating Mektul and claiming The Hammer of Kamasa.

zones.suggested_route: Spiral pattern curling inwards. Boss is found at the top wall of the large main area.
zones.notes: Huge spiral (clockwise or counterclockwise). Travel full 360 to find boss. Portal back to town after killing Queen of Filth.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Queen of Filth
points_of_interest.location_hint: Spiral pattern - boss at top wall of main area after traveling full 360

points_of_interest.name: The Gentle Crone (Secret Vendor)
points_of_interest.reward: Sells higher quality Jewellery and Spellcaster gear
points_of_interest.location_hint: Secret vendor

points_of_interest.name: The Crone's Cauldron (Requires 3 Fungi)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure - requires 3 fungi

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill the Queen of Filth, then portal back to town
walkthrough_steps.tip: Huge spiral - travel full 360 to find boss at top wall

town_visits.instructions: Go down the stairs near the well / the Hooded One again, and enter the Temple of Kopec (opposite of the Drowned City)

zones.suggested_route: Triangular layout; find the entrance to the next floor in one of the three corners.
zones.notes: Triangle-shaped zone. Go up stairs twice, then kill Ketzuli. Stay in shade to not take damage. Stairs in corners of triangle.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Ketzuli, High Priest of the Sun
points_of_interest.location_hint: Go up stairs twice - stay in shade to not take damage

walkthrough_steps.action: Go up the stairs twice, then kill Ketzuli, High Priest of the Sun
walkthrough_steps.tip: Triangular zone - stairs in corners - stay in shade to not take damage

town_visits.instructions: Talk to Alva and ride the elevator up, go through the gateway, then down the stairs again to enter Utzaal

zones.suggested_route: Same layout as The Drowned City. Boss (Viper Napuatzi) is typically towards the right end of the zone, facing North.
zones.notes: Same layout as Drowned City. Sacrificial heart can randomly drop here (if not found, continue to Aggorat). Kill Viper Napuatzi (towards right end, facing north). Find exit to Aggorat (top right, facing north).

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Viper Napuatzi
points_of_interest.location_hint: Towards right end of zone, facing North

points_of_interest.name: Perculiar Fortunes (Golden Idols)
points_of_interest.reward: Various Idols that can be sold to Oswald for Gold (500-1500 Gold each)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure - sellable for 500-1500 gold each

walkthrough_steps.action: The sacrificial heart can randomly drop in this zone
walkthrough_steps.tip: If you don't find it in Utzaal, just go to next zone - do not farm until it drops

walkthrough_steps.action: Search and kill Viper Napuatzi
walkthrough_steps.tip: Towards right end of zone, facing North

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to Aggorat and enter Aggorat
walkthrough_steps.tip: Again always to top right end of zone, facing north

zones.suggested_route: Find the large 'worship platform'. The exit to Black Chambers is usually top left; Sacrificial table is usually top right.
zones.notes: Follow voices of Trial of Atziri (sound on beneficial). Exit to Black Chambers after big plaza (top left). Sacrificial table after big plaza (top right). Kill monsters until you find sacrificial heart (if not found yet). Checkpoint port to table, loot dagger, place heart, stab heart (2 skill points). Checkpoint port to Black Chambers.

points_of_interest.name: Sacrificial Altar (Blood Sacrifice Quest)
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)
points_of_interest.location_hint: After big plaza, top right end of zone

points_of_interest.name: Vaal Goliaths (Drop Sacrificial Heart)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Kill monsters until you find it - required quest item

points_of_interest.name: Peculiar Fortunes (Golden Idols)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure

walkthrough_steps.action: Follow the voices of the Trial of Atziri (on the big plaza), go through to find the next checkpoint
walkthrough_steps.tip: Sound on is beneficial in this zone!

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit towards the Black Chambers
walkthrough_steps.tip: After big plaza, always to top left end of zone

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Sacrificial table
walkthrough_steps.tip: After big plaza, always to top right end of zone

walkthrough_steps.action: The sacrificial heart can randomly drop in this zone
walkthrough_steps.tip: If you haven't found it until now, continue to kill monsters until you find it

walkthrough_steps.action: Checkpoint port to the sacrificial table, loot the dagger, place the heart, stab the heart
walkthrough_steps.tip: 2 skill points reward

walkthrough_steps.action: Checkpoint port to the Black Chambers, enter the Black Chambers
walkthrough_steps.tip: Final zone of Act 3

zones.suggested_route: Three major sections separated by bridges. Doryani's arena is on the opposite side from the entrance, along the center line.
zones.notes: Final boss of Act 3. Three sections separated by bridges. Doryani's arena on opposite side from entrance along center line (top left or top right depending on entry angle).

points_of_interest.name: Final Boss: Doryani, Royal Thaumaturge
points_of_interest.location_hint: Opposite side from entrance along center - top left or top right depending on entry angle

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and defeat Doryani, Royal Thaumaturge
walkthrough_steps.tip: Three sections separated by bridges - opposite side from entrance

town_visits.instructions: Go through Portal to the encampment, speak with Doryani, after the cataclysm speak with him again, then speak with the Sin and eventually Alva to get to Act 4 (Kingsmarch)

zones.suggested_route: Talk to Doryani, Alva, Rog, and Makoru (Captain of Aurora May) to unlock the island map.
zones.notes: Speak with Doryani, then Alva. Take the Boat Charter. Speak with Tujen, Ange, Kanu and then with Makoru to select an island to travel to. Whakapanu Island suggested first (for currency exchange/trading ASAP). Arastas suggested after three main islands (Whakapanu, Shrike, Prison). Ngakanu suggested after Arastas.

points_of_interest.name: Makoru (Captain)
points_of_interest.reward: Grants access to Karui Archipelago map
points_of_interest.location_hint: Speak with Makoru to select island - islands can be done in almost any order

walkthrough_steps.action: Speak with Doryani, then Alva and take the Boat Charter
walkthrough_steps.tip: Begin Act 4 progression

walkthrough_steps.action: Speak with Tujen, Ange, Kanu and then with Makoru to select an island to travel to
walkthrough_steps.tip: Whakapanu Island suggested first - Arastas after three main islands - Ngakanu after Arastas

zones.suggested_route: Use this area to catch up on XP; find the entrance to Singing Caverns, usually at the far end of the island.
zones.notes: Optional: Crabshell cavern (alongside beach). Find Shark Pit to kill Great White One for Shark fin (across island on beach - move close to water). Find Petrified Pirate for torn map piece. Find exit to Singing Caverns (far end of island).

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Great White One (Shark Pit)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Across island on another beach - trigger fight by moving close to water at gaps in rock formation

points_of_interest.name: Petrified Pirate
points_of_interest.location_hint: Torn map piece for unlocking Plunder's Point (4 total needed)

points_of_interest.name: Crabshell Cavern (Clawcrunch)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Alongside the beach part of area - defeat the rare

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Crabshell cavern and defeat the rare
walkthrough_steps.tip: Alongside beach - level 4 uncut support gem

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Shark Pit to defeat the Great White One and loot the Shark fin
walkthrough_steps.tip: Across island on beach - trigger by moving close to water at gaps in rock

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Petrified Pirate to get the torn map piece
walkthrough_steps.tip: 1 of 4 torn map pieces - unlocks Plunder's Point

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Singing Caverns
walkthrough_steps.tip: Approximately far end of island compared to starting point (UNCONFIRMED)

zones.suggested_route: The boss is located on the opposite side of the 'square' from the entrance (circular or diamond shape layout).
zones.notes: Optional: Beckoning Clam (complete counter for humming pearl - turn in at Rog for rare amulet). Find Chamber of Echoes and kill Diamora. Go back to ship and select new location.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Diamora, Song of Death
points_of_interest.reward: Weapon Piece, Shoreline Hideout (unlocks hideout after speaking to Ange)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Opposite side of square from entrance - circular or diamond shape layout

points_of_interest.name: Beckoning Clam (Humming Pearl)
points_of_interest.reward: Rare Pearlescent Amulet (Quest turn-in to Rog)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Complete counter to loot pearl - +8 all ele resistance rare amulet

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Beckoning Clam and complete the counter to loot the Humming Pearl
walkthrough_steps.tip: Turn in whenever back in town at Rog - rare amulet +8 all ele res

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Chamber of Echoes and kill Diamora, Song of Death, then speak to the Hooded One
walkthrough_steps.tip: Final boss of Whakapanu Island - unlocks Shoreline Hideout

walkthrough_steps.action: Go back to the Ship and select a new location
walkthrough_steps.tip: Click UI element on top left of screen to get to ship

zones.suggested_route: Follow the long and winding road; the boss is located at the end.
zones.notes: Incredibly linear. Optional: Corpse nest for torn map piece. Find corrupted nests and kill Scourge of the Skies at end.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Scourge of the Skies
points_of_interest.location_hint: End of long winding road - linear path

points_of_interest.name: Corpse Nest
points_of_interest.location_hint: 2 of 4 torn map pieces - unlocks Plunder's Point

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Corpse nest encounter and loot the torn map piece
walkthrough_steps.tip: 2 of 4 torn map pieces

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the corrupted nests and kill the Scourge of the Skies
walkthrough_steps.tip: Linear path - boss at end

walkthrough_steps.action: Go back to the Ship and select a new location
walkthrough_steps.tip: Click UI element on top left of screen

zones.suggested_route: Locate the entrance to Solitary Confinement.
zones.notes: Kill monsters until Chapel Key drops. Find and open Chapel Door, kill rare and minions (30% increased Mana or Life Recovery from flasks - can be changed later). Find exit to Solitary Confinement. TIP: Following ship side wall is best in 3/4 layouts. Always take first Prison Gate.

layout_guides.name: Early Prison Gate - Parallel to Ship - S Exit
layout_guides.tips: Hug ship wall. Prison Gate parallel to the ship's direction. Hug south inside wall to south exit.

layout_guides.name: Early Prison Gate - Early Forgotten Cells - N Exit
layout_guides.tips: Hugging the ship wall a tiny bit slower. Early Forgotten Cells. Head through the middle area and hug the north wall to exit.

layout_guides.name: Early Prison Gate - Perpendicular to Ship - N Exit
layout_guides.tips: Hug ship wall. Prison gate is perpendicular to the ship's direction. Hug inside wall through middle area to the north wall to exit. Check for the top faster path to exit.

layout_guides.name: No Early Prison Gate - Must Pass Chapel/Armoury - N Exit
layout_guides.tips: Hug ship wall, you'll run into early chapel/armoury. Run north from entrance to the building. Late parallel prison gate to the ship's direction. Hug inside wall to north exit.

points_of_interest.name: Goddess of Justice (Requires Chapel Key)
points_of_interest.reward: Permanent Buff (Choice: 30% increased Life or Mana Recovery from Flasks)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Chapel Key drops from monsters - reward can be changed later by revisiting

walkthrough_steps.action: Kill monsters until the Chapel Key drops
walkthrough_steps.tip: Required for permanent buff

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and open the Chapel Door, kill the rare and its minions
walkthrough_steps.tip: 30% increased Mana or Life Recovery from flasks - can be changed later

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Solitary Confinement
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue to next zone

zones.suggested_route: Hug the wall that the waves are crashing into.
zones.notes: Linear. Optional: Bronnach the Manhunter (guaranteed unique + rares). Find and kill The Prisoner. Go back to Ship.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Prisoner
points_of_interest.location_hint: Hug wall that waves are crashing into - linear path

points_of_interest.name: Bronnach, the Manhunter (Optional)
points_of_interest.reward: Guaranteed unique item and some rares
points_of_interest.location_hint: Drops guaranteed unique (UNCONFIRMED)

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Bronnach, the Manhunter
walkthrough_steps.tip: Guaranteed unique item and some rares (UNCONFIRMED)

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill The Prisoner
walkthrough_steps.tip: Hug wall that waves crash into

walkthrough_steps.action: Go back to the Ship and select a new location
walkthrough_steps.tip: Click UI element on top left

zones.suggested_route: Head in the opposite direction from the dock. Locate the entrance to Volcanic Warrens on the far end of the area along the furthest wall from the start.
zones.notes: Optional: Beast pen (free and kill Mimbok - lvl 12 skill gem + lvl 4 support gem). Find wrecked boat for torn map piece. Find Primal arena and kill Blind Beast (2 skill points). Find exit to Volcanic Warrens.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Blind Beast (Primal Arena)
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Head opposite direction from dock

points_of_interest.name: Beast Pen (Mimbok the Enslaved)
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Skill Gem (Level 12) + Uncut Support Gem (Level 4)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Find beast pen counter, free and kill Mimbok (UNCONFIRMED)

points_of_interest.name: Wrecked Boat (Flayed Sailor)
points_of_interest.location_hint: 3 of 4 torn map pieces - unlocks Plunder's Point

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the beast pen counter and free and kill Mimbok the Enslaved
walkthrough_steps.tip: Lvl 12 uncut skill gem + lvl 4 uncut support gem (UNCONFIRMED)

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the wrecked boat and loot the torn map piece from the flayed sailor
walkthrough_steps.tip: 3 of 4 torn map pieces

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Primal arena and kill The Blind Beast
walkthrough_steps.tip: 2 skill points - head opposite from dock

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Volcanic Warrens
walkthrough_steps.tip: Far end along furthest wall from start

zones.suggested_route: Long and winding area; boss spawn is on the opposite side of where you enter.
zones.notes: Long winding area. Find Tyrant's throne and kill Krutog. Speak with Matiki. Go back to Ship.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Krutog, Lord of Kin
points_of_interest.location_hint: Opposite side of where you enter - long winding area

points_of_interest.name: Volcanic Nest
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Tyrant's throne and kill Krutog, Lord of Kin
walkthrough_steps.tip: Opposite side from entrance

walkthrough_steps.action: Speak with Matiki
walkthrough_steps.tip: Quest progression

walkthrough_steps.action: Go back to the Ship and select a new location
walkthrough_steps.tip: Click UI element on top left

zones.suggested_route: Follow the path to the other side.
zones.notes: Fully optional zone. Find dead man's chest for torn map piece. Find exit to Journey's End.

points_of_interest.name: Smuggler's Stash
points_of_interest.location_hint: 4 of 4 torn map pieces - unlocks Plunder's Point

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the dead man's chest and loot the torn map piece
walkthrough_steps.tip: 4 of 4 torn map pieces - unlocks Plunder's Point

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to Journey's End
walkthrough_steps.tip: Very easy linear path

zones.suggested_route: Get to the opposite side, furthest from where you entered.
zones.notes: Summon and speak to Tujen. Optional: Rigged ship (timed loot). Find Captain's Chair, kill Captain Hartlin, loot Verisium. Go back to beginning, talk to Freya Hartlin. Go to town, speak with Dannig, take Verisium Spikes. Return to Journey's End, talk to Freya. Impale totems, finish Delirium by killing Omniphobia (2 skill points). Go back to Ship.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Omniphobia (Dark Mists Quest)
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points) (NEW IN 0.4)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Opposite side, furthest from entrance

walkthrough_steps.action: Summon and speak to Tujen
walkthrough_steps.tip: Quest progression

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and loot the rigged ship
walkthrough_steps.tip: Timer starts on first chest - any loot not picked up will disappear

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Captain's Chair, kill Captain Hartlin and loot the Verisium
walkthrough_steps.tip: Required quest item

walkthrough_steps.action: Go back to the beginning (via checkpoint) and talk to Freya Hartlin
walkthrough_steps.tip: Quest progression

walkthrough_steps.action: Go back to town, speak with Dannig and take the Verisium Spikes
walkthrough_steps.tip: Required item

walkthrough_steps.action: Return to Journey's End and talk to Freya Hartlin again
walkthrough_steps.tip: Quest progression

walkthrough_steps.action: Impale the totems and then finish the Delirium encounter by killing Omniphobia
walkthrough_steps.tip: 2 skill points reward - NEW IN 0.4

walkthrough_steps.action: Go back to the Ship and select a new location
walkthrough_steps.tip: Click UI element on top left

town_visits.instructions: Speak with Tujen (Town) to get quest reward (level 13 uncut skill gem)

zones.suggested_route: Exit town, hug the top wall (Coastal Ridge) to find the bells, then return to the central path to find the arena for Torvian.
zones.notes: Optional: Loot Evening and Morning Bell (3 regal, 3 exalted). Talk to and follow Missionary Lorandis into church, then out. Destroy forcefield, kill everyone. Continue to Excavated Pit, kill Torvian (extra currency). Enter Excavation.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Torvian, Hand of the Savior
points_of_interest.location_hint: Return to central path after finding bells - arena for Torvian

points_of_interest.name: Morning Bell
points_of_interest.location_hint: Hug top wall (Coastal Ridge)

points_of_interest.name: Evening Bell
points_of_interest.location_hint: Hug top wall (Coastal Ridge)

walkthrough_steps.action: Loot the Evening and Morning Bell
walkthrough_steps.tip: Some extra currency - 3x regal, 3x exalted

walkthrough_steps.action: Talk to and then follow Missionary Lorandis into the church, then go out again. Destroy the forcefield with any attack/spell and then kill everyone
walkthrough_steps.tip: Quest progression

walkthrough_steps.action: Continue until you find the Excavated Pit and kill Torvian, Hand of the Saviour
walkthrough_steps.tip: Some extra currency

walkthrough_steps.action: Enter the Excavation
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue to next zone

zones.suggested_route: Two large blocks connected by a small central square. Hug a wall until you find the boss/Precursor Forge area.
zones.notes: Optional: Excavated cache (lvl 4 support gem). Find Precursor Forge, defeat Benedictus. Witness lore events, talk to Hidden One, return to town via portal. Then talk to Hidden One again, talk to Rodri on ship to set sail to Ngakanu.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Benedictus, First Herald of Utopia
points_of_interest.location_hint: Two blocks connected by small central square - hug wall to find boss/forge

points_of_interest.name: Excavated Cache
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Excavated cache
walkthrough_steps.tip: Level 4 uncut support gem

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Precursor Forge and defeat Benedictus, First Herald of Utopia
walkthrough_steps.tip: Hug wall - two blocks connected by small square

walkthrough_steps.action: Witness the lore events and then talk to the Hidden One, then return to town via portal
walkthrough_steps.tip: Unlocks Precursor Forge

town_visits.instructions: Talk to the Hidden One again, then talk to Rodri on the ship to set sail to Ngakanu

zones.suggested_route: Snake-like funnel. Complete three challenge rooms. One path leads to Silent Hall, the other to Halls of the Dead.
zones.notes: Snake-like funnel. Optional: rare chest behind waterfall when you get out of caves (lvl 12 skill gem UNCONFIRMED). Complete three 'test of mettle' encounters (linear). Find Silent Hall, press F to pay respects (talk to Navali - 5% increased max mana). Find exit to Hall of Dead.

points_of_interest.name: Silent Hall (Navali's Gift)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Room behind - talk to Navali for lore

walkthrough_steps.action: When you briefly get out of the caves again there is a rare chest behind a waterfall
walkthrough_steps.tip: Level 12 uncut skill gem (UNCONFIRMED)

walkthrough_steps.action: Progress through the cavern and complete each 'test of mettle' encounter
walkthrough_steps.tip: Very linear - impossible to miss anything except maybe next one

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Silent Hall and press F to pay your respects in the room behind it
walkthrough_steps.tip: Talk to Navali for lore - 5% increased maximum mana

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the exit to the Hall of the Dead
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue to next zone

zones.suggested_route: Find the three Hinekora Totems (Tawhoa, Tasalio, Ngamahu) on the corners of an imaginary rectangle to gain permanent buffs before fighting Yama the White.
zones.notes: Find three tests (Tawhoa, Tasalio, Ngamahu), loot blank tattoos at end. Turn in at Totem in Arena, use Tattoo to gain bonus (cannot be changed later UNCONFIRMED). Find Yama's Test, defeat Yama, loot silver coin. Exit to Trial of Ancestors behind Yama encounter.

points_of_interest.name: Hinekora Totems (3 rewards)
points_of_interest.reward: Choice of +5% Res or +5 Attribute (+5% Fire Res or +5 Str, +5% Cold Res or +5 Dex, +5% Lightning Res or +5 Int)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Corners of imaginary rectangle - reward cannot be changed later (UNCONFIRMED)

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Yama the White
points_of_interest.reward: Access to Trial of the Ancestors
points_of_interest.location_hint: Find after collecting three tattoos

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the three tests (Tawhoa, Tasalio, Ngamahu) and loot their blank tattoos at the end. Turn in at the Totem in the Arena and use the Tattoo afterwards to gain the bonus
walkthrough_steps.tip: 5 dex or 5% lightning res (Tawhoa), 5 int or 5% cold res, 5 str or 5% fire res (Ngamahu) - cannot be changed later (UNCONFIRMED)

walkthrough_steps.action: Find Yama's Test, defeat Yama the White and loot the silver coin afterwards
walkthrough_steps.tip: Unlocks Trial of Ancestors

walkthrough_steps.action: Exit to the Trial of the Ancestors behind the Yama encounter
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue to next zone

zones.suggested_route: Complete the Trial and speak to Hinekora (Navali).
zones.notes: Third way of acquiring ascendency points (not yet implemented). Talk to Navali to get Tattoo of Hinekora (2 passive skill points). Go back to Ship (currently bugged?).

points_of_interest.name: Hinekora (Navali)
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Complete trial for 2 passive skill points - third ascendancy path not yet implemented

walkthrough_steps.action: Talk to Navali and get the Tattoo of Hinekora
walkthrough_steps.tip: 2 passive skill points

walkthrough_steps.action: Future third way of acquiring ascendency points
walkthrough_steps.tip: Not yet implemented

walkthrough_steps.action: Go back to the Ship and select a new location
walkthrough_steps.tip: Click UI element on top left (currently bugged?)

zones.suggested_route: Find the boundary edge after leaving the large building and follow it to Heart of the Tribe.
zones.notes: Optional: Medicine Circle (kill monsters, talk to Kaimana - only lore). Find and enter Heart of the Tribe.

points_of_interest.name: Abyss
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Medicine Circle, kill the monsters and talk to Kaimana
walkthrough_steps.tip: Only some lore

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and enter the Heart of the Tribe
walkthrough_steps.tip: Find boundary edge after leaving large building, follow to Heart of Tribe

zones.suggested_route: Continually head Northerly; the final boss is in the direction opposite the nearest Checkpoint.
zones.notes: Final boss of Act 4. Find Sacred Interior and defeat Tavakai. Go back to town, speak with Hooded One. Completes Act 4, onwards with interludes.

points_of_interest.name: Final Boss: Tavakai the Fallen / Tavakai the Consumed
points_of_interest.location_hint: Head Northerly - opposite direction from nearest checkpoint

points_of_interest.name: Meeting House
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Sacred Interior and defeat Tavakai
walkthrough_steps.tip: Head Northerly - opposite direction from checkpoint

walkthrough_steps.action: Go back to the Town and speak with the Hooded One
walkthrough_steps.tip: End of Act 4 - onwards with interludes
